EmailTemplate.name: Hours verification alert
EmailTemplate.subject: YP has reached Challenge with Distinction
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.OwnerFirstName}
{!Contact.Name} has accumulated enough hours to earn the Challenge with Distinction. Please verify their hours if you have not already done so and then put a date into the CwD verified by APM field in their record.
Click on this link {!Contact.Link} to see the {!Contact.Name}'s record
This is a standard automatic email, sent whenever a YP reaches Challenge with Distinction.
